Description: This field is used to record a digital image which is representative of the documented object.
This field is used to record a citation to reference documentation for the documented object.
CRM Path: --> P129i --> E33[22] --> rdf:value --> rdf:Literal --> P129i --> E73[22] --> P2 --> E55 "Citation"

Description: This field is used to record the source used for generating the citation for the documented object.
CRM Path: --> P129i --> E33[22] --> P106i --> E33 [from BibliograPhy Entity Type]

Description: This field is used to record a short biographical free text about the documented person.
The field is used to record the sameness between the entity described and an external authority
